item.description:
http://www.manhattanshort.com/
This event was a lot of fun last year. The film students add a lot of energy and interest to the discussions. This is the only FREE showing, I know of
This series is played all over the world for one week and everyone gets to vote on the best shorts...

Also playing at The Bijou Theatre, Bridgeport, Wadsworth Atheneum, Hartford for a fee.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Manhattan Shorts Film Festival - Free @ Whitney Hall, Yale -New Haven
